Title: WELCOME TO PREMA - PARALLEL RUNTIME SUPPORT SYSTEM
Body: MIME-Version: 1.0 Server: CERN/3.0 Date: Sunday, 24-Nov-96 22:57:34 GMT Content-Type: text/html Content-Length: 2038 Last-Modified: Friday, 25-Oct-96 00:02:15 GMT WELCOME TO PREMA - PARALLEL RUNTIME SUPPORT SYSTEM PREMA: Portable Runtime Environment for Multicomputer Architectures PREMA: Portable Runtime Environment for Multicomputer Architectures Advanced Computing Research Institute , Cornell Theory Center ,  Cornell University Overview Prema is a runtime support system for parallel compilers and problem solving environments that target scientific computing applications.
